Had a great time with an engaged group at Wells Fargo this week. This team is full of talented people and led by servant leaders with a bright future! #kanban #agile #MATRIX

Founded in 1983, MATRIX today is a national Information Technology Solutions provider, producing results for more than 2,300 clients in the last decade. Last year, more than 2,000 MATRIX consultants provided Professional IT Services, Professional IT Staffing, and Telecom Services, helping clients achieve outstanding technology and business success. MATRIX works independently and through partnerships with Microsoft and other vendors and consulting firms. Our solid financial growth, numerous industry accolades, long-tenured associates, satisfied clients and consultants – all bear testament to the great relationships we form with all our stakeholders.Since 2003, MATRIX has helped forward thinking IT organizations like yours use Agile to realize better results and increase customer joy. In addition to offering Agile leadership on engagements we deliver, we also offer Agile coaching and mentoring services to help your teams execute Agile more effectively driving tangible business improvement results.Currently responsible for National Agile Practices, Delivery Services within Matrix Resources Professional Services in a growing Dallas, Houston, Phoenix, and San Francisco, CA (Bay Area) markets.

May 8, 2016, Gervais was a client of Sonja’s

Sonja is extremely knowledgeable and skilled in developing your digital business presence.  She works very closely with you to develop your business goals, mission, user experience, and web site that is specific to your business demands.She developed a great web site after several changes and iterations while I was learning and adapting.  She was patient and responsive.  The business generated interests from several companies leading to consulting engagements and a merger.I enjoyed working for Sonja and learned many critical new skills and experiences around creating your digital presence, branding, B2B communication, social media interconnections, SEO, and SMO.Sonja would be a great asset to any business that wants a quality digital and branding presence.

summary: Gervais is a fearless and adaptive individual where delivery results and customer success is paramount. Being one of the early Agile leaders and innovation focus pioneers, now advising mature and growth stage companies. One of the IBM leaders of Agile and Innovation since 1998. Led Agile and Innovation Transformations for 18 companies.  Advisor to many startups and international companies improving growth results and idea to market realization. Director of the National Agile Practice for MATRIX. Working with Agile leaders within the San Francisco Bay and beyond through the Gateway to Agile series. Executive Director and Board Member of (TEMSCORP) TEMS INC. Advisor and partner for MEEMO innovation focus in eLearning and Tronic-Lab Ltd breakthrough focus on knowledge management solutions. Founder / CEO of Impavid Consulting Inc, home of Impavid Agile(TM), Agile EcoSystem(TM) and Gateway to Agile (TM) as a way to link Practices/Tools, Mindset, Culture and Organization, and Environments through Change Transformation and Enterprise Engineering avoiding Dark Agile.
